It comes with a custom boat and engine cover.  It has red LED deck lights as well as LED factory compartment lights. Boat still looks new and runs like it's new. It has been serviced every year since I have owned the boat. Asking $36,000. Please contact me for any additional info or questions. Thanks for looking
